name: NOTS Covid 2021 Detonator
description:
NOTS (short for nanobots) is a top-down shooter style game, built using lua with LÖVE that explores the mechanics taught in the CS50X 2020 Game Track.
In it, you control a nanobot inserted in a human body to combat the multiplication of COVID 2021 viruses, mutant variations of COVID 19.
Use the w, a, s and d keys to control the ship and the arrow keys to control the direction of the shots.
There are three stages plus a boss.
Eliminate viruses, dodge them and defeat the boss to win the game!
